articles.description: Follow live text updates, radio commentary, score updates, match stats and highlights from PSG vs Tottenham Hotspur in the UEFA Super Cup.
articles.title: PSG vs Tottenham LIVE: Super Cup score, lineups, radio & updates

articles.description: Premier League chief executive Richard Masters says there are no plans to play a top-flight match abroad as he discusses a number of issues prior to the start of the season.
articles.title: Premier League chief Richard Masters says no plans for matches abroad

articles.description: Will Manchester City move for Paris St-Germain goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma if Ederson leaves the club?
articles.title: Gianluigi Donnarumma transfer: Will Man City replace Ederson?

articles.description: The scope of the video assistant referee in the Premier League might be expanded to include decisions on yellow cards and corners, says referees' chief Howard Webb.
articles.title: Premier League: VAR might rule on yellow cards and corners in future - Howard Webb

articles.description: Seven-time Grand Slam singles champion Venus Williams is set to become the oldest player at a major in 44 years after being given a US Open wildcard.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Venus Williams given wildcard to make Grand Slam return in New York

articles.description: BBC Sport TV and radio commentators pick the players they think could be the breakout stars of the new Premier League season, and a manager too.
articles.title: Premier League: 'Little Messi', 'The Spider' and 'The Little Engine' - 21 wildcard players to watch

articles.description: Cricket Australia chief Todd Greenberg warns the traditional Test format could lead to bankruptcy for certain nations and calls for a slimmer schedule.
articles.title: Test cricket could 'bankrupt' nations - Australia CEO Todd Greenberg

articles.description: BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why the legal case between Man City and the Premier League is ongoing.
articles.title: Manchester City's 115 charges: Why is the legal battle still ongoing?

articles.description: Nine-time Grand Slam champion Monica Seles reveals she was diagnosed with myasthenia gravis - a neuromuscular autoimmune disease - three years ago.
articles.title: Monica Seles: Nine-time Grand Slam champion reveals myasthenia gravis diagnosis

articles.description: One month after the end of the best season in their history, Paris St-Germain kick off the new one with the chance to win yet another trophy, against Tottenham.
articles.title: Paris St-Germain look to add fifth trophy in Uefa Super Cup against Tottenham
